entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
